body.name: RADCLO Mini Drone with Camera - 1080P HD FPV Foldable Carrying Case, 2 Batteries, 90° Adjustable Lens, One Key Take Off/Land, Altitude Hold, 360° Flip, Toys Gifts for Kids, Adults, beginner

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: 【1080P Adjustable FPV Drone & APP Control】Equipped with a 1080P HD 90° manually adjustable lens, the drone provides a wider breathtaking field of view. It assists you to catch every wonderful moment from a birds-eye perspective, and lets you enjoy 1080P HD pictures and videos via the “RADCLOFPV” APP. By connecting your phone/iPad with the long-distance drones with cameras, you can enjoy a real-time panoramic view, and share them on your social media with ease.

【Easy To Use with Stable Altitude Hold Function】: Just click the one key take-off/landing button to start flying. Compared to other drones of the same type, we have a more powerful engine, and more stable hover technology, the Altitude Hold function can keep the drone at a certain altitude for easy control fly, and shoot high-quality footage.

【Larger Body Size & Full Accessories】: The package comes with a carrying case that is convenient for outdoor travel. With 2pcs 800mAh batteries, even its the body is larger than other drones, it can last for 22 minutes. Equipped with controller batteries, propeller guard, and spare fan blades, making this drone stands out in its class. It is also a good choice for gifts. Search asin "B0CBV5XVPG" on Amazon to buy if you need more batteries.

【Multiple Functions Fit Your Need】: High-Speed Rotation, Circle Fly, 3 Speed Gear(The speed button is on the Top Right of the Controller, Not the left joystick), Gesture Control, Headless Mode, One Key Take off/ Landing, Altitude Hold, 3D Flip, Low battery warning, Emergency Stop. All its functions and great quality make it not only suitable for beginners, but also skilled players.

【After Sales Guarantee】We suggest you test a flight in an open space first time flying the drone with a propeller guard. (Note: there might be wind interference when using outdoors) If the drone/remote control/APP has any issue during flight, do not hesitate to contact the seller. Against product problems, we'll provide 24hrs technical support, quality warranty, and money-back service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 1080P FPV Drone 2 Stable Hover 3 Headless Mode 4 Powerful 3-Gear Speed 5 Beginner-Friendly

Full Function Experience You can experience one key take-off/landing, headless mode function, 3-speed mode, 360° flip function, emergency stop, and one key return with remote control. Larger Unfolded Body Our drone's body size is 11.7*7.8*1.8inches(unfolded), and its weight is 94g/3.3ounce, which makes it bigger and owns better wind resistance. 1080P HD Camera Wide angle 1080P High definition FPV Wifi camera and 90° manually adjustable lens, allows you to enjoy real-time vivid aerial photos and videos, and creates an amazing impression of the flight for you. Portable and Safe Design The foldable drones for adults can be carried around with a carrying case equipped for you. 22minutes flight(2 batteries), propeller guards, low battery warning, and emergency stop ensure the safety of the flight. Stable Altitude Hold We optimized the algorithm of the drone and gave it more powerful power and a larger body under the same weight. So that it has a better hovering effect, just press the trim button to adjust. 1080P HD Wifi Camera With a built-in 1080P high definition FPV wifi camera, you can easily take vivid aerial photos and videos, and create an amazing impression of the sky. 3D Flips Tap one button, then the drone will perform a 360 flip and roll in any direction, making the flight more exciting. One Key Take Off/Landing Easy to start or land, simply tap the function, and it will fly up automatically and stay flying or flight down slowly. Headless Mode Under this mode, you can play the drone without worrying about what direction it is facing. Emergency Stop Just one click to avoid an accident happening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Starter Drone
reviews.reviewText: The RADCLO Mini Drone with Camera has truly exceeded my expectations! As an avid drone enthusiast, I was seeking a compact yet powerful drone, and this one fits the bill perfectly.Firstly, the 1080P HD camera delivers stunningly clear and sharp footage. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the images and videos captured, even in varying lighting conditions. The ability to capture aerial shots with such clarity adds a whole new dimension to my photography and videography projects.The drone's compact size is a huge advantage. It's incredibly portable, making it easy to take on outdoor adventures without any hassle. The controls are intuitive, and after a quick setup, I was able to fly it smoothly, capturing breathtaking views effortlessly.One of the standout features is its stability in flight. Despite its small size, this drone remains remarkably stable, which is crucial for capturing steady footage. Additionally, the battery life is impressive, allowing for extended flying sessions before needing a recharge.I appreciate the durability of this drone as well. It has endured a few bumps and minor crashes (due to my learning curve!) without any significant damage, which speaks volumes about its build quality.The RADCLO Mini Drone with Camera is an excellent choice for both beginners and experienced flyers looking for a reliable, compact drone that doesn't compromise on performance. I highly recommend it to anyone in search of an affordable yet high-quality aerial photography solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a very Nice Beginners Drone and advisable to be purchased.
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought this drone and it's super fun! I had it flying in no time. It’s sturdy enough to handle a few bumps, which is great for a beginner like me. The camera quality is pretty decent for the price, and I love that it came with extra blades. Flying it is a great way to spend time outdoors. I definitely recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable and fun drone. This drone is excellent for beginners who have never flown a quadcopter before. It is a good gift for children and adults alike. This is a very Nice Beginners Drone and advisable to be purchased.The performance was top class and it's Features in this price segment is very good we got camera, video recorder option, well build controller. Very easy installation and easy to use, the drone is made out of flexible plastic it also comes with propeller guards, 4 extra fans and a screwdriver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Given as a gift to a teen and it survived
reviews.reviewText: The comment months after given the teen was “It’s AWSOME”! I believe that covers most of my questions.He is rough on equipment but this drone still has blades, workable camera, and few scuffs on its shell. It has been use a lot and I’m sure has crashed more than its share knowing the temperament of the operator and his skill level. He says the control is easy, no broken parts for a couple of months of flying and he would recommend this product for his age group and for a great price.Recommended by the buyer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent drone for price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this drone in order to view the roof of my house and chimney without having to climb up. The drone was very easy to learn and I would recommend it for beginners.I did notice that the drone would drift one direction, even when flying inside. When flying outside, even in the mildest breeze, the drone would get caught in the wind and make it impossible to fight out of it. When attempting to go above the house, the wind blew it into the side multiple times. It seems to be a little light and does not turn 'far' enough to fight out of winds.The app is trivial, but easy to use. The pictures and videos worked fine saving them to my phone.Would recommend for inside flying. Would not recommend for high flying outside (unless there is little to no wind).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek drone for all ages
reviews.reviewText: This was our first time with drones and this one didn't disappoint. It came in nice box and had good instructions how to set it up, configure it and then maneuver it with remote control. Took some time adjusting to controls and hitting wall and ceiling few times, we were able to successfully fly it. Battery capacity is good. It lasts 30-40 mins with 2 batteries. Had lot of fun with kids and it's value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have debated buying a drone for some time. Constant searching and reviewing reviews simply got me no where. Friend referred me to this particular drone and swears by its quality, usability and durability. Well he was right. I am as novice as they come when using a drone and I had absolutely no issues learning how to set the machine up and use it. I felt like a kid again!I would without a doubt highly recommend this drone for beginners to experienced operators. The drone is light, well made and seems to be on the higher end of quality.If you are looking for a reliable, reasonably priced drone then this is the right choice for you
Envío rápido y la carta llegó en buenas condiciones sin ningún problema, lo recomiendo

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing drone at great price point
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little drone. We bought it for our 7 year old and he manipulates is easily. It's not great in strong winds, but I imagine that's the case for most drones. Easy to use and a MUST buy for beginners, especially children. My husband is also very keen on it but I've reminded him he needs to share with the child that the present was intended for!!! :)
Over priced and quite flimsy...many other similar products on the market at less price
